name: Campfire v0.1 - Rust Chat Application
description: Zero-friction deployment of Campfire chat application built in Rust. Features real-time messaging, @mentions, sound system, search, and push notifications.

instructions.start:
ðŸ”¥ **Campfire v0.1 Deployment**

Your Rust-powered chat application is being deployed!

**What's being set up:**
- Real-time chat with WebSocket support
- SQLite database with persistent storage
- Full-text search capabilities
- Push notification support
- Bot API for integrations
- Automatic HTTPS with Railway domain

**Next steps:**
1. Wait for deployment to complete (~2-3 minutes)
2. Click the generated URL to access Campfire
3. Create your admin account (first-run setup)
4. Start chatting with your team!

**Optional configuration:**
- Set `CAMPFIRE_VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY` and `CAMPFIRE_VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY` for push notifications
- Set `CAMPFIRE_SSL_DOMAIN` for custom domain with automatic HTTPS
- Enable demo mode with `CAMPFIRE_DEMO_MODE=true` for testing
